question: Comet Hale-Bopp orbits the sun every 70 years. Michael's father saw the Comet when he was 29 years old. Michael saw the comet a second time when he was three times the age his father was when he saw the Comet. How old was Michael when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Michael saw the Comet for the second time when he was 29 years * 3= <<29*3=87>>87 years old.
Comet Hale-Bopp can be seen every 70 years, so Michael saw the comet for the first time when he was 87 years - 70 years = <<87-70=17>>17 years old.
#### 17
